scripts.build: esbuild src/pages/PopupPage.jsx --bundle --outfile=dist/PopupPage.js --define:__BUILD_ENV__SDK_VERSION__='"env"' && esbuild src/pages/OptionsPage.jsx --bundle --outfile=dist/OptionsPage.js --define:__BUILD_ENV__SDK_VERSION__='"env"' && esbuild service_worker.js --bundle --outfile=dist/service_worker.js --define:__BUILD_ENV__SDK_VERSION__='"env"'
